languages.text: {n}Маражай пожимает плечами, явно подражая человеческому жесту.{/n} "Значит, у нас у обоих не было сомнения по поводу того, что здесь произойдет".
{n}Marazhai shrugs, clearly mimicking the human gesture.{/n} "So neither of us had any doubt about what was going to happen here."
languages.original_text: {n}Маражай пожимает плечами, явно подражая человеческому жесту.{/n} "Значит, у нас у обоих не было сомнения по поводу того, что здесь произойдет".

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai shrugs, clearly mimicking the human gesture.{/n} "So neither of us had doubts about what was going to happen here."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai zuckt mit den Schultern, offenbar eine Imitation der menschlichen Geste.{/n} "Wir hatten also beide keinerlei Zweifel daran, was hier geschehen würde."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai shrugs, clearly mimicking the human gesture.{/n} "So neither of us had any doubt about what was going to happen here."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai zuckt mit den Schultern, offenbar eine Imitation der menschlichen Geste.{/n} "Wir hatten also beide keinerlei Zweifel daran, was hier geschehen würde."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋耸了耸肩，显然是在模仿人类的动作。{/n}“也就是说，你我早就知道会发生什么事情。”
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai shrugs, clearly mimicking the human gesture.{/n} "So neither of us had any doubt about what was going to happen here."

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋耸了耸肩，显然是在模仿人类的动作。{/n}“也就是说，你我早就知道会发生什么事情。”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai hausse les épaules, imitant clairement le geste typiquement humain.{/n} « Vous et moi savions donc exactement ce qui allait se jouer ici. »
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai shrugs, clearly mimicking the human gesture.{/n} "So neither of us had any doubt about what was going to happen here."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai hausse les épaules, imitant clairement le geste typiquement humain.{/n} « Vous et moi savions donc exactement ce qui allait se jouer ici. »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai se encoge de hombros, imitando el gesto humano.{/n} «Sí, aquí nadie tenía ninguna duda de lo que iba a suceder».
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai shrugs, clearly mimicking the human gesture.{/n} "So neither of us had any doubt about what was going to happen here."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai se encoge de hombros, imitando el gesto humano.{/n} «Sí, aquí nadie tenía ninguna duda de lo que iba a suceder».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}マラズハイは明らかに人間を真似して肩をすくめる。{/n}「俺たちのどちらも、ここで起きるだろうことについて、何の疑いも持っていなかったってわけだ」
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai shrugs, clearly mimicking the human gesture.{/n} "So neither of us had any doubt about what was going to happen here."

traits.locale_text: {n}マラズハイは明らかに人間を真似して肩をすくめる。{/n}「俺たちのどちらも、ここで起きるだろうことについて、何の疑いも持っていなかったってわけだ」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}İnsanların hareketini taklit ettiği belli olan Marazhai, omuz silkiyor.{/n} "İkimiz de burada olacakları kesinkes biliyorduk yani."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai shrugs, clearly mimicking the human gesture.{/n} "So neither of us had any doubt about what was going to happen here."

traits.locale_text: {n}İnsanların beden hareketlerini taklit ettiği belli olan Marazhai omuz silkiyor.{/n} "Burada ne olacağı konusunda ikimizin de herhangi bir şüphesi yoktu yani."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion
